subject: Dear Old Friend
body:
Dear Old Friend
I'm happy to inform you about my success in getting those funds
transferred under the co-operation of a new partner from Paraguay.
Presently I'm in Paraguay for investment projects with my own share of
the total sum. Meanwhile, I didn't forget your past efforts and
attempts to assist me in transferring those funds despite the fact
that you failed to assist me financially.
Now contacts my secretary his name is Issa Yacouba and you can also
Email him at his ( 
issayacouba2021@gmail.com
 ) ask him to send you the
total sum of $2, 000,000.00 U.S.D. which I kept for your compensation
for all the past efforts and attempts to assist me in this matter.
I appreciated your efforts at that time very much, so feel free and
getting touched with my secretary Issa Yacouba and instruct him where
to send the ATM VISA CARD worth of $2, 000,000 .00 U.S.D; to you
through any of the courier DHL or FedEx service only for proper
security.
Please do let me know immediately you receive it so that we can share
the joy after all the sufferings, I am very busy here because of the
investment projects which I and the new partner are having at hand,
finally, remember that I had forwarded instruction to the secretary on
your behalf to receive that money via ATM VISA CARD, so feel free to
get in touch with him he will send the amount to you without any
delay.
With best regards
Mr. Sal Kavar.

subject: Re:    Dear Old Friend
body:
Hello Mr. Sal Kavar,

I'm thrilled to hear about your success in Paraguay! It sounds like you've been very busy with your new partner and investment projects. I'm glad that despite the challenges we faced, you still remember my efforts to assist you.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please tell me more about these investment projects? They sound fascinating! And how did you meet your new partner from Paraguay?

Also, regarding the ATM VISA CARD that Issa Yacouba will send me, could you provide more details? How does it work exactly? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
James
